member.name: T:WojciechMikołajewicz.Base128
member.summary: Class for Base128 integer conversions

member.name: M:WojciechMikołajewicz.Base128.TrySkip(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.Int32@)
member.summary: Method tries to skip Base128 variable integer value
member.returns: True if success or false if not - which means end of array was reached before whole value was skipped

member.name: M:WojciechMikołajewicz.Base128.Skip(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.Int32@)
member.summary: Method skips Base128 variable integer value
member.exception: End of was reached before whole value was skipped

member.name: M:WojciechMikołajewicz.Base128.TryReadUInt8(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.Byte@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Method tries to read 8-bit unsigned integer () from byte array
member.returns: True if success or false if not - which means end of array was reached before whole was read
member.exception: Read value is too big for

member.name: M:WojciechMikołajewicz.Base128.TryReadInt8(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.SByte@,System.Int32@)

member.returns: True if success or false if not - which means end of array was reached before whole was read
